Study Population Thirty-six adult subject clinical diagnosis non-penetrating TBI ( mild , moderate , severe ) enrol . Subjects recruit NIH , affiliate hospitals/clinics , community . Design This pilot study pre-experimental , test-intervention-retest design . Cardiorespiratory fitness , fatigue severity , cognitive performance , change mood reactivity measure baseline .
